title: Flag of Belarus
cardDescription: The flag of Belarus is a red and green flag with a white and red ornament pattern placed at the left side.
description: The flag of Belarus is a red and green flag with a white and red ornament pattern placed at the left side. The red and green horizontal colors are in 2:1 ratio to each other.

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 30, sc in 2nd ch, sc 23, sab, [sba, sab] x 2, turn
Ch 1, sba, sab, sba, sc 26, turn
Ch 1, sc 24, sab, [sba, sab] x 2, turn
Ch 1, sba, sab, sba, sc 26, turn
Ch 1, sc 24, [sab, sba] x 2, sc 1, turn
Ch 1, [sab, sba] x 2, sc 24, sbc, turn
Ch 1, sc 24, scb, [sba, sab] x 2, turn
Ch 1, sba, sab, sba, sac, sc 25, turn
Ch 1, sc 24, scb, [sba, sab] x 2, turn
Ch 1, sba, sab, sba, sac, sc 25, turn
Ch 1, sc 24, scb, [sba, sab] x 2, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
